Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: One of my sweetest memories in Amsterdam. As good to get a beer by the canal, in the sun by the street or even inside in gorgeous pub style. With locals and lovely staff. Delicious local beers and good food too!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: We were here only to have a drink. The waiter was really friendly. He suggested that we should try the blonde beer and my husband said it was really good. While I had only ginger tea, but it‚Äôs real ginger not some ginger on a tea bag. The ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great little pub.. The two ladies working there (owners? ) super fun and really make you feel at home

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: We have been there, waited for 20 minutes. The table has not been cleaned, we have not been addressed what we want and of course other tables have been served around. Never again.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: One of the best bars in the area. Friendly staff and nice seats on the canal

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: ‚Äòt Smalle might be one of the greatest Amsterdam bar i‚Äôve been to! First, they don‚Äôt play music, which might discourage some people from coming but it‚Äôs actually much better this way. Listening to the white noise and people chatting offers ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Lovely staff, wonderful atmosphere and a great location. Just went in for drinks but had a very lovely evening.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Even without the amazing canal-side patio (which you should definitely sit at) this is an amazing bar. Great food, great drink selection; (try the Jenever, we loved it!) sitting by the canal sipping a beer at Cafe 't Smalle is just about the best way you can spend an afternoon in Amsterdam. We loved it here.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great tiny outdoor seating on the canal. Don't fall into the water. Perfect place for a beer after walking by the canals enjoying the lovely city. We all need to stay hydrated. Be prepared to share a table because there are not that many places. But that is just great because then you might meet new interesting people.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
+: location is really nice, staff is very friendly, ideal for some drinks on the terrace
-: food is ok, a bit pricy for what it is, our lunch was ruined by a group of ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: My favorite brown bar in Amsterdam. Really friendly staff and probably one of the nicest terraces in the city where you can sit and watch swans swim by. Great Dutch beers on tap.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice pub by the canal with plenty of seating at the canal edge plus rustic wood panneled bar with lots of low stools, brown ceiling. Lovely place for a beer in the day or in the evening

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice place  very quiet relax  and  chill , the  staff  its  very kind  , I had  a sandwich and  beer  , everything  delicious  .

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Oh my! Such an absolutely lovely Jordaan brown bar. If you're looking for gazelleigheid on a rainy day, this place has got it. Super cosy atmosphere and very affordable beers. Friendly barman. Just a great little pub oozing with charm.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Small and cosy cafe next to the canals in the heart of the Jordaan. This cafe is authentic and it's a good place to meet with people for a conversation. The staff is very nice. In summer you can sit in from of the door outside next to the canals. There is a good selection of beers and wine.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Amazing location, outdoor seating is basically in the canal. It was phenomenal on a nice sunny morning. Coffee was great, but the food was just okay. A little overpriced for breakfast which was mostly just breads. I would recommend for a coffee or drink pit stop in the sun. üåû

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Dove in here late one evening, during a windy storm & couldn't have been more delighted. Lovely cosy bar with really friendly staff and a great range of drinks.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: You have to have the Snert. Split pea soup in its most glorious form. Tons of ham. Absolutely wonderful. Great beers here too and amazing atmosphere.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Really great little bar. Great booze and nice snacks as well. The main party of the bar is quite small, however there is also a small upstairs around the back. Ferry to cozy and small, but it has great decor and ambience. Would definitely recommend and would return

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
Tasty coffee ‚òïÔ∏è
Good vibes üòé

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: A place to sit and watch the beauty of Amsterdam beside a canal. Sometimes you need to wait a bit to get an outdoor table, but it's worth it. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great location. Service is a bit disorganized and the tables a bit unsteady but the location makes it well worth the stop for a coffee or a beer.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: We had apple cake and coffee seating in front of the canal you can see birds and boats go by, apple cake sims like is a thing to do in amsterdam, and the cake or pie was delicious is not like a American apple pie the apples are soft but not ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great place, tasty cheese & delicious wine. The personal was very friendly, attentive and smiling. Stop there and enjoy Amsterdam!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great place to sit and have a drink overlooking the canal and the westertower. Friendly and fast staff.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
A lovely little bar in Jordan area, next to the river.

Great food. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
Visited in Winter with friend

Very cosy and cute pub with a friendly atmosphere. Popular with locals and tourists, beer recommendations were fantastic and the interior is gorgeous.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great cafe, just had wine and snacks, great atmosphere and superb Apple Pie

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice apple pie, beers and tea with nice views to a typical canal street -if you are on the outside

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice view at the canal, good apple cake, coffee ok. Nice staff. Cozy inside.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: The most beautiful and magical places so far on our trip! You feel like you stepped back in history! It is a must, try the local drinks!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice place to walk by during canals walk. Nice service and offer in good price üëåüèª

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great bar with a very lovely terrace next to the canal. Lovely during spring and Autumn afternoons.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: I don't know what the little pancakes were called,  but they are amazing.  Great dessert and cozy little spot.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Lovely quiet pub on the canal. The Dutch pancakes with butter and sugar are amazing!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Amazing food, nice atmosphere and the kindest staff!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great little cafe. Good food, cold beer and excellent service.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice, old, little and cozy local cafe. Friendly service and you can have a normal conversation, since there is NO loud music or no music at all, which it makes even better. This is a place that Amsterdam was ever known for. Unfortunately ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Cool historic Old cafe/bar. Very cosy, good beer, relaxed locals

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Beautiful bar, hilarious staff. Thank you for a good time and conversation. Great bartenders.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: The view is gorgeous from the outside places and the inside is cozy. The beers are well poured, the service is friendly and the prices are medium.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Drinks are good and service has been great!! Will definitely come back!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Perfect place to sit next to a water. Dont expect the third wave coffee, but the "traditional one". Croissants are amazing and the small breakfast for under 9e in Amsterdam is quite a good deal (with coffee, orange juice, egg, croissant and butter and jam). All in all very comfortable and nice.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: This is a very cute little bar on the water. I highly recommend!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice place to unbrace yourself by having a glass of beer.  It has a nice view of canal.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
I like this place a lot. Raw meat sandwich is a must!
Update march 2020: Still awesome! Thanks!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Friendly service but not intrusive. Fantastic quality beers poured perfectly. Great snacks perfectly matching with glass of Dutch brews. Authentic atmosphere feel and great location. Will come back.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Officially on my list of favourite cafes / pubs / bars on Earth. While I was there the power was of for some reason in that district of Amsterdam and the entire bar was candlelit - which was perfect. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: This place is like a museum! Probably my first stop when I get off the plane and penetrate the Jordaan neighborhood!! Outstanding beer selection and a highly recommended pea soup!!!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Excellent little bar. Really friendly staff and a nice place to relax and enjoy a beer away from the hustle and bustle. It is small inside but when I went it didn't feel too cramped. They have pint glasses here. Prices are cheapish. Really nice decor.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Good service with nice personal staff and the building itself is a fine example of the famous brown caf√©s in Amsterdam. Good beer on draft and a good bottled selection with wine also on offer. It faces directly onto the canal and is easy to ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very characteristic dutch pub from another time.  Small, with a few levels, often hard to find a place.   Some mix of locals and tourists. Full bar, pub grub, good atmosphere.  No loud music.  Just sit and chat and drink, maybe Munch on something

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: One of the best outside sitting areas in the city! Just around the corner from the Anne Frank Museum it is a perfect place to sit and enjoy the city. Right on a canal you can enjoy the boats go by and watch the bikes cycle past. The service ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Amazing cafe. Great canal views and traditional brown cafe interior. Good prices for Amsterdam and the area. Something you will really notice here is how friendly the staff here Are - Sebastian is simply amazing!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: One of my favourite traditional pubs in Amsterdam, lovely setting, great oppurtunity for photos. Lovely beer, and great snacks. Good for kids, and very friendly waiting staff, would highly recommend for the family wanting to quench their first after an exploration of amsterdam in the hot sun

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very nice place, interesting interior. In good weather offers very nice small terrace next to the canal, but difficult to find a spot on a busy sunny day. Service and menu are of average standards of Amsterdam. It worths visiting for the cozy atmosphere.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Fabulous location, slightly grumpy service but all good. It is, as one would expect, a big tourist trap, like most of the centre of Amsterdam, but if one visits early-ish, it'll be fine. Lovely views over the canals, centrally located and definitely worth a visit.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very cute quiet little place with a good drink selection. Beer, wine, and liquors. We did not get a chance to taste the food but it looked really yummy

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great little bar. When you enter it's as if you've stepped back in time: wood panelled walls and stain-glass windows. A friend who lives in Amsterdam took us here on our first visit a couple of years ago and it made such an impression we came back.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Good Americano, Terrace is extremely beautiful to sit on - directly at the canal

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Small, idyllic. Good place to start, stop or end a Trip to Jordan.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Love this little brown cafe. It's warm and cosy with a good drink selection.  Their patio by a canal is beautiful and has a spot you can pull up to in your boat.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: One of my favorite brown bars in Amsterdam. A very hobbit feeling inside with a mix of locals and tourists. Small but nice outdoor seating. La Chouffe on tap!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very nice breakfast for a very good price. The patio seating is unbeatable. Went there twice and would go again whoever I had a chance. Highly recommended.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Best pints of Heineken we have tasted in Amsterdam. Snacks were very nice and the staff are very friendly and helpful. Would recommend 't SMalle to everyone that visits around the area. And thank you for minding our bag. :-)

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very friendly and polite staff, quick service outside. Good pancake puff's, tasty dark beer on pump. Returned several times.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Fabulous cafe bar to sit by the canal on a sunny day but even better is to squash inside with the locals and tourists on a wet winters evening and enjoy the candle lit tables and great beer selection. Recommended.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Friendly staff, good beers and great snacks.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Authenticity at its finest ! Small and convivial bar. The bartender was super friendly, he had some really good recommendations and he spoke 5 languages ! Including french ;)

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Brilliant old cafe/pub near Anne Frank museum. Lovely location. Great beer selection. Friendly staff. Cosy. Busy.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Such. A. Lovely. Place!!! Authentic inside, and tables at the canal are so nice... Will definitely go again when in Amsterdam again!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
Really nice and beautiful Amsterdam brown Coffee. But it can be very crowed but most of the people leave early.
If you are in Amsterdam you should definitely have a pint or a coffee there.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: A cosy brown caf√© right in the Jordaan. Don't overlook it, it doesn't have a lot of direct sunlight seeping in but it makes it up with the mood and with the tasty dishes. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: A lovely small bar we found whilst wandering around. Good beer and food available. Outside seating available.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: We love 't Smalle and come here every time we're in Amsterdam. Don't miss the bock beer, if you're in season, and delicious apple pie with cream!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: If you want to feel like a local and if you want a real and true Amsterdam experience, go to Cafe t'Smalle. My favourite cafe / brown bar in all of Amsterdam and one of my favourite places in the world.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: PERFECT Amsterdam classic brown cafe. Sit upstairs if you can and gaze at the atmospheric barrels and be grateful for the super friendly waitress. Olives are the typical Amsterdam type (read: not great), but the oude kaas hit the spot with ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: So beautiful this place! Witty barstaff

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Food is nice enough and the location is lovely. However, the older lady waiting completely forgot our order so we were there for much longer than intended!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great location, nice cheese platter.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great little bar. When you enter it's as if you've stepped back in time: wood panelled walls and stain-glass windows. A friend who lives in Amsterdam took us here on our first visit a couple of years ago and it made such an impression we came back.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Love this little brown cafe. It's warm and cosy with a good drink selection.  Their patio by a canal is beautiful and has a spot you can pull up to in your boat.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great place for a drink!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Best pints of Heineken we have tasted in Amsterdam. Snacks were very nice and the staff are very friendly and helpful. Would recommend 't SMalle to everyone that visits around the area. And thank you for minding our bag. :-)

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Fabulous cafe bar to sit by the canal on a sunny day but even better is to squash inside with the locals and tourists on a wet winters evening and enjoy the candle lit tables and great beer selection. Recommended.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
Really nice and beautiful Amsterdam brown Coffee. But it can be very crowed but most of the people leave early.
If you are in Amsterdam you should definitely have a pint or a coffee there.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Super gezellig inside with outdoor seating on the canal too! We got wine and beer and had a lovely time here

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Really yummy croissants and the coffee is very good! The location is beautiful.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: One of my favorite brown bars in Amsterdam. A very hobbit feeling inside with a mix of locals and tourists. Small but nice outdoor seating. La Chouffe on tap!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very busy usually but with a great terrace right on the canal.  Very old historic cafe near the Anne Frank house.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: We ended our short trip on Jordaan in this caf√© and we're not disappointed! We sat outside, just near the canal, got a Heineken and enjoyed the moment.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great little old fashioned bar with good range of local craft beers. Lively atmosphere and good outdoor space by the canal.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Good place for drinks n snacky foods. Not for a sit down meal, very cool being canal side n having your drink

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Perfect spot to have a drink and snack outside, right on a lovely and peaceful canal. Simple and casual, and such a great view!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great Breakfast, Great views, watch the world of Amsterdam go by on the Canals as you sip fine Coffee and nibble on divine bread, meat and cheese.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very nice place, but was very crowded when we got there. Waitress forgot to order our sandwich so we paid and went somewhere else

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Beautiful brown pub on the water. Delightful snack food, great vibe snd friendly service.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Top top !

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Wait staff is pants-on-fire bad.  Once we ordered drinks, they never came back -- to take orders or bring us the bill.  So we left.  Free drinks, I suppose.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: It's a tourist place by the canal so you'll have to be lucky to get a seat. If you do, you'll have access to OK food and OK drinks at OK prices (for Amsterdam's Jordaan district).

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very rude staff. We sat at the bar for 20 minutes and no one even looked at us. When we finally asked if we could order, they looked almost annoyed. Not recommended, service is awful!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: At this time of year (January) it's a really nice quiet, uncrowded place to go. It gets really busy when the tourist season heats up

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very busy usually but with a great terrace right on the canal.  Very old historic cafe near the Anne Frank house.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very good atmosphere. Popular with locals and tourists. Food and service good. Recommended

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great bar with a real old school feel about it. Staff are really friendly. All round great vibe.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice local pub in the Jordaan, bar personnel is friendly and helpful. Great start for a Saturday afternoon beer.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: The apple pie was awesome. Try the mini pancakes too. The waitress was very cool. This is a very good caf√©.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: If you are just gonna visit one bar in AMS, make it this one. Perfect for breakfast, lunch and the beer-in-between. Nice terrace.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Never ate there, but loved ending the nights with a  pint or two. Perfect little bar in a perfect city.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: A charming, authentic bar with beautiful outside seating on the canal and excellent staff!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
A genuine bar with great canal view.
Good draft beer and kind staff.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: My favourite bar in Amsterdam, on the canal  just off the tourist trap and NO WIFI ‚ù§

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great place to sit outside and enjoy a beverage. Typical canal-side cafe.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Sweet little place right on a canal. iOS olives, so far. Keep your phone in your pocket. If it falls in the canal, it's upgrade time.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Art, joy, declration

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice ambience inside and outside. Only had Coffee and was disappointed. I have however quite high standards in terms of crema etc.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
A great place to sit by the canal and watch the goings on.
Great appetizer plates and beer.
May 2014

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
So cozy!!! I love it here. Great draft beer selection.

Be careful on the steps

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Really nice place to take a breather during your tour through the city center. Especially if you can sit outside!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very cosy place by the canals. We had a lovely drink at night and the atmosphere was magical.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Had to move twice while sitting on the seats they put out! Bit hard to enjoy your drink while playing musical chairs...

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Feels like home but they have way better drinks than my place

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice old pub serving tasty beers. Canal-side terrace. Friendly staff.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Really yummy croissants and the coffee is very good! The location is beautiful.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Fantastic little terrace on the canal. Coffee is good and the service okay.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very pleasant position, on a quiet canal and with a 'locals' feel rather than overtly touristy.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Enjoyed it very nice staff and they were quick I can see why they call it cafe t'smalle (coz it's small)

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great food, great wine and the wait staff were lovely

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very long delay in service for the drinks and the waitress totally forgot our food. Very bad experience there.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Nice, cozy traditional pub with a nice selection of Belgian beer and great service

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Fun little pub just minutes away from Amsterdam city centre - reasonable prices for the location and nice beer selection.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great bar! Nice views over the canal and fair pricing!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great atmosphere good local food and welcoming staff, would recommend a visit.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: The food snacks are great and so is the upstairs seating area with it's rustic and cozy atmosphere.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Atmosphere + great beers,  certainly worth checking this bar out!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Friendly staff and awesome food. Would recommend for a quick lunch!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Stunning location. Well preserved traditional bruin kroeg. Lovely relaxed ambience

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Cozy and old fashioned pub in the city centre. Great service and a good place to end the evening.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Fantastic canal side along with nice snacks; good place for meeting and leisure

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Best place for a drink at the Dutch canals and is one of the official places you should visit before you die!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: One of the prettiest spots in Amsterdam, good selection of beers, wine and snacks.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: I would give it 5 stars if it was playing some music! Great place, excellent service!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text:
Cosy, bar/cafe... No fuss

Good prices, albeit a little rough around the edges

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: a beautiful place to rest for some time if visiting Amsterdam. Nice interiors, good position.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Average food and price, but sitting just next to one of the canals let you enjoy an outstanding view.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Wonderful place, perhaps becoming too touristy as last last time the waiter could not speak dutch!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Lovely local pub tucked away from the bustle of Dam Square. Friendly staff.

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Only had a beer here but interesting place

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Great place for a drink!

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very good. Fair prices and a very nice location. take a look around, if you like :-)

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Very cozy and the price is ok. We stopped to make a pit stop and it was nice

Name: 't Smalle
Review Text: Really nice place for a first beer on a trip through the city.

Name: 't Smalle
